人	17		人	rén	person	man; people; mankind; someone else	傢人   工人   別人	jiārén gōngrén biéren		9	ㄖㄣˊ	ㄐㄧㄚ ㄖㄣˊ  ㄍㄨㄥ ㄖㄣˊ  ㄅㄧㄝˊㄖㄣ˙	㇓   ㇏	A depiction of a standing *person* reaching toward another, suggesting people in mutable interaction | *human* (being). Compare 仁. In dual-element characters, 人 nearly always appears on the left in the form 亻. In many such characters (價 儗 仰 儆 偃 儀 etc.), 人 suggests human agency, but there are others in which 人 has no semantic function at all. In these cases (伎 優 供 佑  傾 佹 etc.), 人 is used simply to create a derivative character conveying meanings that dropped from the original one.	images-large/4eba-large.gif	工人 體育館, 阿奇諾 傢族 的 長 女 和 薩魯哥 是 夫妻 One shows a small child, while the second shows a child with rapidly growing hair | *child*; *son*; *boy*; *person*; *suffix appended to small objects*. 五	64		五	wǔ	five	five; surname	五金	wǔjīn		309	ㄨˇ	ㄨˇㄐㄧㄣ	㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐	The relevant oracle bone form of this character shows two crossing lines between two parallel lines. 那	93		那	nà	that	that, that one, those	那裡   那兒   那些	nàli nàr nàxiē		38	ㄋㄚ`	ㄋㄚ`ㄌㄧ˙  ㄋㄚ`ㄦ˙  ㄋㄚ`ㄒㄧㄝ	㇓   ㇆   ㇐   ㇐   ㇌   ㇑	"The left-hand element# is a variant of 冄 as described in 冉 (supple). 那 adds 邑 (village/settlement), but the original form of the character had a different element than 邑. The identity of this original form and the original meaning of the character are now obscure, although the meaning was likely to have been connected with the concept ""supple"" as this concept is active in derivative characters such as 娜, 挪 and 梛. *How*, *which*, *what*, and *that* are all borrowed meanings. 那 is used in transliterations of terms such as 刹那 (Sanskrit: ksana), an instant."	images-large/90a3-large.gif		nan

下	99		下	xià	below	under, underneath, below; down; inferior; bring down	下午   下課   下麵	xiàwǔ xiàkè xiàmiàn		42	ㄒㄧㄚ`	ㄒㄧㄚ`ㄨˇ  ㄒㄧㄚ`ㄎㄜ`  ㄒㄧㄚ`ㄇㄧㄢ`	㇐   ㇑   ㇔	"The relevant oracle bone form of this character is a depiction of one line below another, suggesting the idea of *under* (contrast 上) | *low*; *lower*; *below*; *down*; *subordinate*; *descend*. Extended meanings from ""down"" or ""below"" include *come/go down*; *fall*; *drop*; *hang* (down/from); *hand down*; *younger*; *have diarrhea*; *abort* (a fetus); *step/move back*; *withdraw*; *leave the capital*; *retire* and *surrender*. By further extension are *carry*, *remove* and *clear a table* (← take down from a table); *grate* (← grated shavings that fall below); *give* and *do someone the favor of *(← hand ← hand down); *obtain* (← be handed/given); and *latter half* (← bottom/lower of two halves)."	images-large/4e0b-large.gif	年月日 下午 時		MDBG   MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG	年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ          月        yuè        ㄩㄝˋ          日        rì        ㄖˋ                                       下        xià        ㄒㄧㄚˋ          午        wǔ        ㄨˇ                                       時        shí        ㄕˊ	Year, month, day, afternoon	Year  Month  Day    Next  Noon    Hour

出	125		出	chū	exit	go out, send out; stand; produce	齣去   齣生   齣來	chūqù chūshēng chūlái		55	ㄔㄨ	ㄔㄨ ㄑㄩ`  ㄔㄨ ㄕㄥ   ㄔㄨ ㄌㄞˊ	㇗   ㇑   ㇑   ㇗   ㇑	"The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 屮# grass shoot + 土 earth | grass/bud/sprout protruding from the ground | *protrude*; *emerge*; *appear*; *go/come out* | *proceed*; *depart*; *start/leave*; *set forth*; *begin to*; *origin*; *hold/put out*; *break out*. Extended meanings from these basic ideas include *let out*; *take out*; *present* (for inspection); *turn on*; *give off*; *emit*; *express*; *submit*; *hand/send in*; *send*; *publish*; *issue*; *serve* (food/drinks); *give*; *hang (out)* (a flag); *open* (a business); *pay*; *flow*; *one's turn*; *be on duty*; *come out at*; *reach*; *arrive*; *attend*; *appearance*; *birth*; *be produced*; *be brought up*; *graduate* (from school); and *be in demand*. Also, *pretext* (← present an explanation ← present) and *answer* (a phone) (← appear on the receiving end of a call ← appear). *Soup stock* and *broth* are via the use of だし as an abbreviation of 出し汁 (だしじる). 甲	158		甲	jiǎ	first	armor, shell; fingernails; 1st heavenly stem	甲			721	ㄐㄧㄚˇ		㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑	"Originally, a depiction of objects being pressed down, suggesting ""press down on objects in containing them"" | *armor*; *helmet*; *shell*. 萬	159		万	wàn	ten thousand	ten thousand; innumerable	萬一   韆萬   萬分	wànyī qiānwàn wànfēn		381	ㄨㄢ`	ㄨㄢ`ㄧ   ㄑㄧㄢ ㄨㄢ`  ㄨㄢ`ㄈㄣ	㇐   ㇑   ㇑   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇆   ㇑   ㇀   ㇔	The relevant oracle bone form of 萬 is a depiction of a scorpion, the curved tail of which contains virulent venom. *Innumerable* and *ten thousand* are borrowed meanings. Along with the introduction of Buddhism into China came the symbol 卍 (Sanskrit svastika, a good luck symbol). The Han gave 卍 the same pronunciation as 萬, and eventually 卍 came to be used as a simplified form of 萬.	images-large/4e07-large.gif		nan				૒啳

向	179		向	xiàng	orientation	toward, direction, trend	方嚮   一嚮   偏嚮	fāngxiàng yīxiàng piānxiàng		353	ㄒㄧㄤ`	ㄈㄤ ㄒㄧㄤ`  ㄧ ㄒㄧㄤ`  ㄆㄧㄢ ㄒㄧㄤ`	㇒   ㇑   ㇆   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐	"The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 宀 roof/building + a hole# | smoke being compressed through a ventilation hole and escaping to the outside of a structure | *face (toward)*; *head toward*; *direction*. Extended meanings include *confront*; *advance upon*; *approach*; *become/grow*; *turn to*; *point at*; *send* (a messenger); (on) *the other side*; *opposite direction* and *beyond*. Also, *position* (on a matter) and *be inclined to do* (← the approach one takes to an issue); *allocate to* (← time/objects one directs toward a matter); *destination* (← head toward); *the other party* (← person one faces); and *suitability* (← be appropriately suited to face a situation). For the idea of smoke passing through a ventilation hole, compare 囱 as described in 窓 as well as 匆, a variant form of 囱."	images-large/5411-large.gif		nan

事	215		事	shì	matter	affair, matter, business; to serve; accident, incident	同事   故事   事情	tóngshì gùshì shìqing		106	ㄕ`	ㄊㄨㄥˊㄕ`  ㄍㄨ`ㄕ`  ㄕ`ㄑㄧㄥ˙	㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇚	The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 又 hand/action indicator + an upright tube for holding slender, inscribed bamboo slats | an official raising a slender tube containing bamboo slats inscribed with records | *matter*; *affair*; *thing* (← matters recorded) | *job*; *work*; *serve*; *attend to* (← carry out official duties). 此	218		此	cǐ	this (literary)	this, these; in this case, then	如此   因此   彼此	rúcǐ yīncǐ bǐcǐ		113	ㄘˇ	ㄖㄨˊㄘˇ  ㄧㄣ ㄘˇ  ㄅㄧˇㄘˇ	㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇒   ㇟	"止 (leg/foot) + an abbreviated form# of 比 (line up) | legs/feet lined up irregularly. *This/these* (*here*) and (in) *this way* are borrowed meanings. As an independent character, 此 is regarded to consist of six strokes, but five when used as an element in a dual-element character (compare the treatment of stroke counts in 臣)."	images-large/6b64-large.gif	中華民國 使用 民國紀 年 與 西 曆 國號 紀年 以西 元 年月日 為 中華民國元 年月日 稱為 元旦 因此 西元紀 年數 減去 即 為 中華民國紀 年數		MDBG   MDBG   MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG   MDBG 四	267		四	sì	four	four	四處   四方   四季	sìchù sìfāng sìjì		234	ㄙ`	ㄙ`ㄔㄨ`  ㄙ`ㄈㄤ   ㄙ`ㄐㄧ`	㇑   ㇕   ㇓   ㇄   ㇐	"The relevant oracle bone form of this character is four horizontal lines indicating *four* | *fourth*; *four times*. The present form derives from SIS, which is 口 mouth + 八 split right and left | splitting off/dispersal of breath through the nostrils to right and left (compare 自). Earlier, a bronzeware inscription form combined 口 with the horizontal lines of the oracle bone form (repositioned) to suggest the same idea of dispersal of breath. In that sense, the application of the meaning ""four"" to the present character represents a borrowed meaning."	images-large/56db-large.gif		nan				缓	
明	268		明	míng	bright	bright, light, brilliant; clear	明天   明年   聰明	míngtiān míngnián cōngming		154	ㄇㄧㄥˊ	ㄇㄧㄥˊㄊㄧㄢ   ㄇㄧㄥˊㄋㄧㄢˊ  ㄘㄨㄥ ㄇㄧㄥ˙	㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇓   ㇆   ㇐   ㇐	"Originally, 月 moon + 向# (ventilation hole) | *bright* moonlight streaming through an *open* window, and manifesting the hidden | *brightness*; *light*. Extended meanings from the idea of the light of dawn (signaling the end of one day and the start of the next) include *spend/pass* (the night); *be visible*; *the next/following* (day/week/year); *begin*; *end*; and *dawn*. *Disclose* and *confide* are extended senses of ""open"" (open up to), as are *clarity*; *evident* and *obvious*. *Be conversant with* is via the idea of illumination, here with respect to a particular subject matter. The reading ミン refers to the Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)."	images-large/660e-large.gif	年 年, 年 ～ 年	nan	MDBG            MDBG                     MDBG            MDBG            MDBG	年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ                                       年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ                                                                    年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ                                       ～        ～        ～                                       年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ	Nian Nian, Nian ~ Nian	Year    Year        Year    ~    Year

The phonetically close term conveyed by 㒼 (described in 満) suggests that 美, like 㒼, involved the notion ""cover the body completely with an animal skin that has its head still attached."" The exact provenance of the meanings *beautiful* and *good* is uncertain, as is the identity of the element replaced by 大."	images-large/7f8e-large.gif	年 愛 因斯 坦曾經 探訪 住 在 美國 加州 的 查理 卓彆林, 年月日 民主黨 侯選人 貝拉 通	357		通	tōng	communicate	pass through, common, communicate	通知   交通   溝通	tōngzhī jiāotōng gōutōng		222	ㄊㄨㄥ	ㄊㄨㄥ ㄓ   ㄐㄧㄠ ㄊㄨㄥ   ㄍㄡ ㄊㄨㄥ	㇖   ㇔   ㇑   ㇆   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇔   ㇕   ㇝	"As per 甬# (run through) + 辵 movement | run/*pass through*. The many extended meanings include *go back and forth* (to work, school etc.); *commute*; *attend a school*; *frequent* (a particular place); *run between two points*; *street*; *avenue*; *traffic*; *go/run through*; *pass*; *pierce*; *penetrate*; *drainage*; *ventilation* and *conduct*. Also, *cook/heat up food* (← pass food through heat); *look through/over* (← run the eyes over); *do continuously* (← run through); *pass* (a bill); *maintain* (a position) (← be consistent from start to finish ← run through); *understanding* (← know a subject from start to finish ← run through) | *be reasonable/logical*; *reputation*; *be well known* (← reputation for understanding). Further, *as expected* and *in accordance with* (← run in accordance with expectations), *be known as by* and *be regarded as* (← reputation), *accept/admit* (← admit the logic of an argument), *degree* (← degree of completeness ← run from start to finish), and *thus*(ly) (← run in accordance with logic/expectations)."	images-large/901a-large.gif	交通, 交通 建設	nan	MDBG   MDBG                     MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG	交        jiāo        ㄐㄧㄠ          通        tōng        ㄊㄨㄥ                                                                    交        jiāo        ㄐㄧㄠ          通        tōng        ㄊㄨㄥ                                       建        jiàn        ㄐㄧㄢˋ          設        shè        ㄕㄜˋ	Transportation, transportation construction	交  通        交  通    建  設定

mandatory intercourse or sexual intercourse with a person under the legal age of intercourse.  Most of the social climate determines that there is an age limit that must be an adult to show the coexistence of sexual intercourse. If the law has sexual intercourse with a legal minor, it will be punished or sentenced to criminal responsibility.”	不  Almost  合    上  Describe    Two  Item    结构  成    要  件    之    性  交    ie    was    see  为    strong  制    sexual  cross    or    and    不  Full    合  法  sexual    交  year  age    person  person    发    生  性     行  为    This    系    为    社  会    法  法    和    道  德    所    不  容    许        性    交  行    为    在    some People  Some    State  Home    政  府    民  族    社  会    风  土    Recognize  定    上    Multi  Half    Yes    Year  Age    Of    Limited  System    Required  Required    成  年    才  能    Sex  Transaction    Combined    以  here    制  定    法   Law    如  果    and    法  律    上    未  成  年    的    人    Sexual  Cross    will  be    open  penalty    or    punishment  to    punishment  responsibility

午	409		午	wǔ	noon	noon; 7th terrestrial branch	上午   中午   下午	shàngwǔ zhōngwǔ xiàwǔ		812	ㄨˇ	ㄕㄤ`ㄨˇ  ㄓㄨㄥ ㄨˇ  ㄒㄧㄚ`ㄨˇ	㇒   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑	"A depiction of a square-headed mallet, two or more of which would be used in alternation when pounding grain in the mortar framing the mallets. Latter half of a unit of measurement (e.g., for a group of twelve, 午 covers 7-12) as well as *11 A.M. to 1 P.M.* and *noon* are associated meanings in the sense of the alternating point of a given day. *Horse* (as the seventh sign of the Chinese zodiac) and *south* are borrowed meanings. In derivative characters such as 忤 and 許, 午 exerts the conceptual influence ""yield,"" via the image of yielding so another person can carry out a task such as pounding grain."	images-large/5348-large.gif	年月日 下午 時		MDBG   MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG	年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ          月        yuè        ㄩㄝˋ          日        rì        ㄖˋ                                       下        xià        ㄒㄧㄚˋ          午        wǔ        ㄨˇ                                       時        shí        ㄕˊ	Year, month, day, afternoon	Year  Month  Day    Next  Noon    Hour

若	415		若	ruò	as if	if, supposing, assuming; similar	假若   若乾   倘若	jiǎruò ruògān tǎngruò		270	ㄖㄨㄛ`	ㄐㄧㄚˇㄖㄨㄛ`  ㄖㄨㄛ`ㄍㄢ   ㄊㄤˇㄖㄨㄛ`		The relevant oracle bone form of this character is a depiction of a supple young women combing her hair. A seal inscription form transforms the hair element into 艸 grass/plant and adds 口 (an object) below, probably under the influence of the seal inscription form of 右 | *youth* (← suppleness of youth) | *immature*. The minor meanings of *either/or*, *some ... while others ...*, and *if* are borrowed meanings.	images-large/82e5-large.gif		nan

元	425		元	yuán	beginning	first; dollar; origin; head	公元   元旦   多元	gōngyuán Yuándàn duōyuán		370	ㄩㄢˊ	ㄍㄨㄥ ㄩㄢˊ  ㄩㄢˊㄉㄢ`  ㄉㄨㄛ ㄩㄢˊ	㇐   ㇐   ㇓   ㇟	"As per 兀# (head) + a horizontal line | *head* | *origin*; 化	468		化	huà	transform	change, convert, reform; -ize	文化   變化   化妝品	wénhuà biànhuà huàzhuāngpǐn		317	ㄏㄨㄚ`	ㄨㄣˊㄏㄨㄚ`  ㄅㄧㄢ`ㄏㄨㄚ`  ㄏㄨㄚ`ㄓㄨㄤ ㄆㄧㄣˇ	㇒   ㇑   ㇒   ㇟	The relevant bronzeware inscription form shows a fallen person aligned with a seated person. 便	479		便	biàn	convenient	convenience, ease; expedient	便宜   方便   便條	biànyí fāngbiàn biàntiáo		328	ㄅㄧㄢ`	ㄅㄧㄢ`ㄧˊ  ㄈㄤ ㄅㄧㄢ`  ㄅㄧㄢ`ㄊㄧㄠˊ	㇒   ㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇓   ㇏	"The right-hand element was originally an element of uncertain composition, but the Old Chinese pronunciation of 便 suggests that this element conveyed the concept ""spread"" (compare 丙, a constituent element of 更). 便 adds 人 person (| human agency) | cause to spread | *pass smoothly* | *excrement* (← offal that passes smoothly out of the body) | *easy*/*at ease* (← pass smoothly/easily) | *convenient*; *expedient* (← make something easy). The further addition of 水 water is to expand the scope of the term to that of a heavy *flow* of water | *float*; *pour* | *trendy*; *school* (of thought, art etc.); *style*; *rank*; *grade*. Other extended meanings include *wash off/away*; *circulate*; *wander*; *passage* (of time); *descent*; *distribute*; *divert*; *stroll*; *cruise*; and (a) *sink*."	images-large/6d41-large.gif	對外 交流, 年 中華音 樂人 交流 協會 十大 優良 專輯 單麯	nan	MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG                     MDBG            MDBG   MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG	對        duì        ㄉㄨㄟˋ          外        wài        ㄨㄞˋ                                       交        jiāo        ㄐㄧㄠ          流        liú        ㄌㄧㄡˊ                                                                    年        nián        ㄋㄧㄢˊ                                       中        zhōng        ㄓㄨㄥ          華        huá        ㄏㄨㄚˊ          音        yīn        ㄧㄣ                                       樂        lè        ㄌㄜˋ          人        rén        ㄖㄣˊ                                       交        jiāo        ㄐㄧㄠ          流        liú        ㄌㄧㄡˊ                                       協        xié        ㄒㄧㄝˊ          會        huì        ㄏㄨㄟˋ                                       十        shí        ㄕˊ          大        dà        ㄉㄚˋ                                       優        yōu        ㄧㄡ          良        liáng        ㄌㄧㄤˊ                                       專        zhuān        ㄓㄨㄢ          輯        ji        ㄐㄧ˙                                       單        dān        ㄉㄢ          麯        qū        ㄑㄩ	Foreign Exchange, Top Ten Excellent Album Singles of the Chinese Musicians Exchange Association of the Year	对  外    交  流        年    中  华  音    乐  人    交  流    Association  会    十  大    Excellent  Good    Special  Edit    Single  Music

余	595		余	yú	moi	I, my, me; surname; surplus	余			1955	ㄩˊ		㇒   ㇏   ㇐   ㇐   ㇚   ㇒   ㇔	"The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 土# pile of earth being smoothed (lazily) with a scoop, with a bronzeware inscription form adding 八 split right and left | stretch the arms to both sides to disperse surplus earth in smoothing/leveling a pile | *surplus* (← level surplus earth). In Japan, 余 was also adopted as a Shinjitai (new character form) to replace 餘, according to which 余 also conveys the meanings *remain*; *leave*; *be left over*."	images-large/4f59-large.gif		nan				'ㄉㄧㄢˋa

Also, *attract* (attention/sympathy) and *cite* (an authority) (← draw attention), *look up* (a word) (← draw out a single term from among many); *be finished* and *close* (← ebb away ← recede), as well as *catch* (a cold) (← have one's strength sapped ← draw out)."	images-large/5f15-large.gif		nan				彥潰牲獡湟牵慩束ϱ

召	633		召	zhào	summon	imperial decree; summon	號召   召開   召集	hàozhào zhàokāi zhàojí		1686	ㄓㄠ`	ㄏㄠ`ㄓㄠ`  ㄓㄠ`ㄎㄞ   ㄓㄠ`ㄐㄧˊ	㇆   ㇓   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐	"As per 刀# (curve) + 口 mouth | curve the arm and beckon, supplementing oral summoning | *summon* | *term of respect*. From the idea of a person of superior rank beckoning to an inferior for service, the verb めす is used as a polite expression for the following senses: *eat*, *drink*, *put on*, *wear*, and *take* (a bath/a conveyance). めす is also used in the same way for *buy* or *catch* (a cold). *Invite* is a borrowed meaning."	images-large/53ec-large.gif	月 日 北大學生 自治 聯閤會 成員 王丹 召開 民主 沙龍 號召 繼續 罷課 聲援 準備 到 中國 記者 協會 寅	671		寅	yín	sign of the tiger	to respect, reverence; respectfully; 3rd terrestrial branch	寅			3929	ㄧㄣˊ		㇔   ㇔   ㇖   ㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇒   ㇝	"The relevant oracle bone form of this character combines 矢# arrow + a pair of hands | straighten an arrow. Years and months. Zhao Ziyang's conversations under house arrest began to be published in the Chinese Bookstore in Los Angeles, USA. There are two radio formats in the United States: FM and AM. The two most common types of radio stations in the United States are talk. 矣	776		矣	yǐ		particle of completed action	矣			1976	ㄧˇ		㇜   ㇔   ㇒   ㇐   ㇐   ㇓   ㇏	The relevant seal inscription form indicates an arrow hitting a squarish, lumpy target and coming to a stop. For the idea of stopping, compare 處 and 醫. 矣 was eventually employed as a *particle* indicating the completion of an action.	images-large/77e3-large.gif		nan				IN PLANQ

寶	801		宝	bǎo	treasure	treasure, jewel; precious, rare	寶貝   寶貴   寶寶	bǎobèi bǎoguì bǎobǎo		628	ㄅㄠˇ	ㄅㄠˇㄅㄟ`  ㄅㄠˇㄍㄨㄟ`  ㄅㄠˇㄅㄠˇ	㇔   ㇔   ㇖   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇒   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇗   ㇑   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇐   ㇒   ㇔	This character was written with a combination of many different elements before 寶 was settled upon as the standard form. Among these combinations, most of the forms featured both 宀 roof/building and 貝 commodities. The phonetic similarity to 富 suggests that the original idea of the character that came to be written 寶 was that of 富, namely, a building stocked with abundant possessions | *treasure* | *currency* | *cherish*.	images-large/5b9d-large.gif	寶貝, 神奇 寶貝	nan	MDBG   MDBG                     MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG	寶        bǎo        ㄅㄠˇ          貝        bèi        ㄅㄟˋ                                                                    神        shén        ㄕㄣˊ          奇        qí        ㄑㄧˊ                                       寶        bǎo        ㄅㄠˇ          貝        bèi        ㄅㄟˋ	Baby, Pokémon	宝  贝        神  奇    宝  贝

斷	811		断	duàn	sever	sever, cut off; interrupt	不斷   打斷   判斷	bùduàn dǎduàn pànduàn		636	ㄉㄨㄢ`	ㄅㄨ`ㄉㄨㄢ`  ㄉㄚˇㄉㄨㄢ`  ㄆㄢ`ㄉㄨㄢ`		"斤# ax + the right-hand element of 繼 (sever threads) | *sever* a curving, pendent object | *cut/break* (off); *stop*; *act/do* (resolutely); *disappear* | *decision* (← resolute decision ← decisive cut; compare 判, 裁, 決 and 折) | *refuse*; *reject*; *decline* (a request) (← negative decision on a request) | *prohibit*. Also, *permission* (← favorable decision granting permission) and *ask permission* (← request a decision). *Give notice/warning*, *abstain from* and *quit* (a bad habit) are from the original sense of severance. Also, *make an excuse* (← give reasons for a faulty act ← give reasons for a decision)."	images-large/65ad-large.gif	幾韆年 來 中國 一直 是 世界 上 人口 最多 的 國傢 部分 解釋 瞭 中華民族 遭 外夷 侵略 其 文化 得以 延續 不斷 的 原因, 宗 法製 和 政府 習	837		习	xí	learn	practice; flapping wings	練習   學習   習慣	liànxí xuéxí xíguàn		657	ㄒㄧˊ	ㄌㄧㄢ`ㄒㄧˊ  ㄒㄩㄝˊㄒㄧˊ  ㄒㄧˊㄍㄨㄢ`	㇆   ㇔   ㇀   ㇆   ㇔   ㇀   ㇒   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐	"Originally, 羽 feather/wing + 旦# (long and flat) | bird exerting pressure in flapping its long, flat wings. *Learn* is an extended meaning (← learn by repetition ← repeated action in flapping the wings) | *accustomed*; *custom*; *take lessons*. 旦 was later replaced by 白. In derivative characters, 習 most often appears in the form seen for example in 慴, 摺 or 褶."	images-large/4e60-large.gif	愛的 習慣		MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG	愛        ài        ㄞˋ          的        de        ㄉㄜ˙                                       習        xí        ㄒㄧˊ          慣        guàn        ㄍㄨㄢˋ	Love habit	Love  的    Xi  used

turning point in the expansion of the movement. 足	846		足	zú	lower leg	foot; attain, satisfy, enough	足球   不足   滿足	zúqiú bùzú mǎnzú		667	ㄗㄨˊ	ㄗㄨˊㄑㄧㄡˊ  ㄅㄨ`ㄗㄨˊ  ㄇㄢˇㄗㄨˊ	㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇒   ㇏	A depiction of a *leg*/*foot*. Conceptually, the Old Chinese term attached to 足 would have involved compression or compaction (compare the cognate 束), for instance, in compacting an object by stamping or trampling it | *sufficient*; *ample* (← compact sufficiently/amply for the purpose) | *serve a purpose*. 微	932		微	wēi	tiny	small, prefix micro-, trifling	微笑   稍微   微弱	wēixiào shāowēi wēiruò		826	ㄨㄟ	ㄨㄟ ㄒㄧㄠ`  ㄕㄠ ㄨㄟ   ㄨㄟ ㄖㄨㄛ`	㇒   ㇒   ㇑   ㇑   ㇗   ㇑   ㇐   ㇓   ㇟   ㇒   ㇐   ㇒   ㇏	"The relevant seal inscription form of the right-hand element# combines a representation of thread stretching above and hanging below a line + 攴/攵 action indicator | manipulate slight threads. 微 adds 彳 movement (for emphasis/clarification) | *slight*; *fine*; *minute*."	images-large/5fae-large.gif		nan				<!

爾	935		尔	ěr	you (literary)	you; that, those; final particle	偶爾	ǒuěr		750	ㄦˇ	ㄡˇㄦˇ		A depiction of a large seal (for pressing images that adhere in soft clay or, later, on documents). *That*, *so*, *you*, *just*, *near* and *like* are borrowed meanings. In dual-element characters, 爾 sometimes appears in the reduced form 尓.	images-large/5c14-large.gif		nan				bl!

隻	939		只	zhī	one of a pair	single, one of pair, lone	船 隻	chuánzhī		760	ㄓ	ㄔㄨㄢˊㄓ	㇒   ㇑   ㇔   ㇐   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇇   ㇏	An abbreviated form of 雙 (pair of birds), removing one of the 隹 bird elements in order to indicate *one of a pair* | *sole*; *only*; *a few*. *Counter for ships* is a borrowed meaning, likely owing to the connection between these vessels and sea birds.	images-large/53ea-large.gif		nan				?ɖ啳

領	945		领	lǐng	collar	neck; collar; lead, guide	帶領   領導   領域	dàilǐng lǐngdǎo lǐngyù		761	ㄌㄧㄥˇ	ㄉㄞ`ㄌㄧㄥˇ  ㄌㄧㄥˇㄉㄠˇ  ㄌㄧㄥˇㄩ`	㇒   ㇏   ㇔   ㇖   ㇔   ㇐   ㇒   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇐   ㇒   ㇔	"As per 令# (long sequence) + 頁 head | string of heads severed at the *neck* (compare 県 and 梟) | *rule*; *possess* (← display severed heads to demonstrate rule) | *domain*."	images-large/9886-large.gif	所有 領域, 新 領導 集體	nan	MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG                     MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG	所        suǒ        ㄙㄨㄛˇ          有        yǒu        ㄧㄡˇ                                       領        lǐng        ㄌㄧㄥˇ          域        yù        ㄩˋ                                                                    新        xīn        ㄒㄧㄣ                                       領        lǐng        ㄌㄧㄥˇ          導        dǎo        ㄉㄠˇ                                       集        jí        ㄐㄧˊ          體        tǐ        ㄊㄧˇ	All fields, new leadership group	所  有    Leader  Domain         New    Leader  Guide    Set  body	
尋	946		寻	xún	seek	seek, search, look for; ancient	尋找   找尋	xúnzhǎo zhǎoxún		762	ㄒㄩㄣˊ	ㄒㄩㄣˊㄓㄠˇ  ㄓㄠˇㄒㄩㄣˊ	㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇚   ㇔	"Originally 寸 hand/action indicator + an element# combining another hand with abbreviated forms of 左 left and 右 right | settle one's hands right and left. The original sense appears to have been that of a position of obeisance taken when visiting a superior in seeking to have a request granted | *visit*; *seek* | *search for*; *ask*; *inquire*. Additionally, the phonetic evidence suggests the hands would have been concealed in assuming the position of obeisance."	images-large/5bfb-large.gif		nan				/brր

宿	976		宿	sù	stay overnight	stop, rest, lodge, stay overnight; constellation	宿捨   住宿	sùshè zhùsù		795	ㄙㄨ`	ㄙㄨ`ㄕㄜ`  ㄓㄨ`ㄙㄨ`	㇔   ㇔   ㇖   ㇒   ㇑   ㇐   ㇒   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐	The relevant oracle bone form of the element now written 百 shows two figures squeezed into a bed, that shrink in curling positions. 宿 adds an element combining 人 person and 宀 roof/building | (place to) curl up and sleep | *lodging*; *shelter* | *inn*. Also, *be pregnant* (← lodge a fetus). There is no etymological connection with 百.	images-large/5bbf-large.gif		nan

As of the day of the month, the major hospitals in Beijing have rescued students and stayed in hospital for observation. No one died. 童	1112		童	tóng	juvenile	child, boy, servant boy; virgin	兒童	értóng		1170	ㄊㄨㄥˊ	ㄦˊㄊㄨㄥˊ	㇔   ㇐   ㇔   ㇒   ㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐	The relevant bronzeware inscription form is an element combining 東 (pierced sack) and 土 earth (suggesting the same idea found in 重 of weight thrusting heavily down upon the earth) + another element combining a needle and an eye | run through a slave-child's eye with a needle (compare 民, 敃 and 僕) | *child* (← child servant ← servant ← slave). The present form amalgamates the top two elements into 立 and the bottom two into 里.	images-large/7ae5-large.gif		nan				ge/53e!

詹	1144		詹	zhān	verbose	surname; talk too much, verbose	詹			2372	ㄓㄢ			"厃# combines 厂 cliff (immediately beneath which objects adhere) + a crouching person | person crouched atop a cliff, hidden from the sight of those below. Later, crouching became associated with the idea of slumping in shouldering a burden. The original form of 詹 adds 言 words | bear/endure the burden of another person's *annoyingly verbose* speech | *harp on*. 詹 acquired the element 八, a graphic accretion unrelated to the character's etymology."	images-large/8a79-large.gif	詹姆斯敦		MDBG   MDBG   MDBG   MDBG	詹        zhān        ㄓㄢ          姆        mǔ        ㄇㄨˇ          斯        sī        ㄙ          敦        dūn        ㄉㄨㄣ	Jamestown	James  M  S  Dun

兼	1148		兼	jiān	double	unite, combine; connect; and	兼職	jiānzhí		1526	ㄐㄧㄢ	ㄐㄧㄢ ㄓˊ	㇔   ㇒   ㇐   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇑   ㇒   ㇏	The relevant seal inscription form shows two ears of grain + a hand | storehouse encompassing grain that has been gathered then stored/put away | *combine*; *unite*; *serve/perform concurrently*; *simultaneous*. *Unable to do* is a borrowed meaning. 罷	1154		罢	bà	cease	cease, finish, stop; give up	罷工   罷瞭	bàgōng bàle		990	ㄅㄚ`	ㄅㄚ`ㄍㄨㄥ   ㄅㄚ`ㄌㄜ˙	㇑   ㇕   ㇑   ㇑   ㇐   ㇜   ㇔   ㇑   ㇆   ㇐   ㇐   ㇒   ㇟   ㇒   ㇟	The lower element was originally 卑 (flatten or lower). The addition of 罒 net indicated the spreading/lowering of a net over prey, ending a hunt. *Leave* (off), *stop* and *end* are associated meanings. In the present form, 卑 is replaced by 能 (bear).	images-large/7f62-large.gif		nan

秋	1205		秋	qiū	autumn	autumn, fall; year	鞦天   鞦季	qiūtiān qiūjì		1041	ㄑㄧㄡ	ㄑㄧㄡ ㄊㄧㄢ   ㄑㄧㄡ ㄐㄧ`	㇒   ㇐   ㇑   ㇒   ㇔   ㇔   ㇒   ㇓   ㇏	The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 禾 grain/rice + 束 bundle | bundle and compact/shrink harvested crops in *autumn*/*fall*. The character was later reinterpreted, as shown by a seal inscription form that is 禾 plus an element combining 火 fire and 龜 turtle | dry and shrink the size of harvested crops (as turtle meat is dried over a fire; compare 焦). The present form repositions 禾 and 火 while eliminating 龜. Note also the variant form 龝, which combines 禾 and 龜.	images-large/79cb-large.gif		nan

掛	1283		挂	guà	hang	hang, suspend; suspense	掛號   掛號 信	guàhào guàhàoxìn		1117	ㄍㄨㄚ`	ㄍㄨㄚ`ㄏㄠ`  ㄍㄨㄚ`ㄏㄠ`ㄒㄧㄣ`	㇐   ㇚   ㇀   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇔	"A variant of 挂 hang | *hang*. In Japanese, the verbs かかる and かける bear numerous meanings that stem directly or indirectly from the concept of ""hang."" The principal meanings follow. かかる： *hang*; *be covered with/by*; *be splashed*; *be locked*; *be caught*; *be tied (up)*; (of an engine) *start/catch*; *attack*; *be subject to*; *be suspected of*; *be connected/related*; *be involved in*; *call* (out); *be brought up*; *be anxious about*; *depend on*; *take/require* (time); *pay*; *carry* (insurance); (of a play/movie) *be showing/playing* and *set about*. かけ る： *hang*; *put* (on a stove/fire); *cover*; *sprinkle*; *pour*; *lock*; *fasten*; *grasp*; *catch/snare*; *bind* and *put/set up*. Also, *be in charge*; *weigh*, *fix*, *wear*, *multiply* and *begin to/be on the point of*."	images-large/6302-large.gif		nan				按軇摯곃挠軇A

Also, *thin* (out), *empty out* and *be free/unoccupied*, as well as *watermark* (← mark made visible by transparency)."	images-large/900f-large.gif		nan				牢‾戼㹲整浡⼼ʡ

休	1290		休	xiū	rest	rest, stop; retire; do not!	休息   退休   休假	xiūxi tuìxiū xiūjià		1124	ㄒㄧㄡ	ㄒㄧㄡ ㄒㄧ˙  ㄊㄨㄟ`ㄒㄧㄡ   ㄒㄧㄡ ㄐㄧㄚ`	㇒   ㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇒   ㇏	"人 person + 木 tree/wood, the latter in all likelihood a remnant of an obsolete phonetic element# that, as with other terms in Old Chinese cognate with 休, involved curvature with respect to an actual or figurative frame. The combination of elements may have suggested a person resting in the shade of a tree with curved branches, or that of a curved, wooden construction | *rest*; *stop*; *quit*. Extended meanings include *recess*; (a) *break/breather*; *holiday*; *vacation*; *day(s) off* (from work); *absence*; *sleep*; *suspend* (work); *stop* (doing); and *lay fallow*."	images-large/4f11-large.gif		nan				a!

肯	1346		肯	kěn	agree	willing; consent to, permit	肯定   中肯	kěndìng zhòngkěn		1184	ㄎㄣˇ	ㄎㄣˇㄉㄧㄥ`  ㄓㄨㄥ`ㄎㄣˇ	㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇓   ㇆   ㇐   ㇐	A variant form of 肎 ( 冖 cover + 肉 flesh), indicating an arm hanging from a shoulder (compare 肩) and covering the side of the body. *Consent*, *agreement* and *permission* are borrowed meanings. In Old Chinese, neither 冖 nor 肉 conveys the pronunciation of this character, suggesting that a) one (or both) of the original components differed or b) one functioned as an abbreviated form of a now-obsolete character.	images-large/80af-large.gif		nan

As the Old Chinese pronunciation of 塵 matches that of 廛 (long strip), the two characters are graphically similar, and both involve long strings of objects, 塵 may be regarded as a variant and reinterpreted form of 廛.	images-large/5c18-large.gif		nan

寒	1399		寒	hán	frigid	cold, wintry, chilly	寒假   寒冷	hánjià hánlěng		1232	ㄏㄢˊ	ㄏㄢˊㄐㄧㄚ`  ㄏㄢˊㄌㄥˇ		"The relevant seal inscription form is 宀# roof/building + an element combining piled bricks/stones and 廾 pair of hands | create layers of building materials in raising a shelter. Later, 氷/ 冫 ice was added at bottom to emphasize a structure offering protection from the *cold*."	images-large/5bd2-large.gif		nan

隱	1402		隐	yǐn	hidden	hide, conceal; hidden, secret	隱藏   隱士   隱約	yǐncáng yǐnshì yǐnyuē		1234	ㄧㄣˇ	ㄧㄣˇㄘㄤˊ  ㄧㄣˇㄕ`  ㄧㄣˇㄩㄝ	㇌   ㇑   ㇒   ㇔   ㇔   ㇒   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇕   ㇐   ㇐   ㇔   ㇃   ㇔   ㇔	"The element above 心 in 㥯 was originally 爪 claw/hand + an element combining a symbol in the shape of 工 + another hand | use one hand on top and the other on the bottom to cover and conceal a 工-shaped object. The addition of 心 heart/emotions suggests secrets concealed firmly in the heart. To 㥯# (conceal), 隱 adds 阜 piled earth | earthen wall behind which objects are concealed | *hide/conceal*."	images-large/9690-large.gif		nan

折	1414		折	zhé	discount	break off, snap; bend	挫摺   打摺   麯摺	cuòzhé dǎzhé qūzhé		1280	ㄓㄜˊ	ㄘㄨㄛ`ㄓㄜˊ  ㄉㄚˇㄓㄜˊ  ㄑㄩ ㄓㄜˊ	㇐   ㇚   ㇀   ㇒   ㇓   ㇐   ㇑	The relevant bronzeware inscription form shows a tree cut in two + 斤 ax | chop/cut lumber | *break*; *snap*; *interrupt*; *die*; *lose* | *bend*; *fold*. Other extended meanings include *yield to* (← bend in defeat ← bend), *judge* and *decide on* (← decisive decision ← decisive cut; compare 判, 斷, 裁 and 決), *at the time of* (← time ← suitable time), and *folded object* or *small wooden box* (← end or point created by a fold ← fold).	images-large/6298-large.gif		nan				潮㱲戯㹲㰠!

The People's Daily first published an editorial titled Maintaining Social Stability Is the Current Overall Situation. ㄙㄨㄛˇ	Sexual intercourse that does not meet the above two elements is regarded as forced intercourse or sexual intercourse with persons under the legal age of intercourse. This is not permitted by social laws and morals. During the restructuring of Guangwu in the Eastern Han Dynasty, the Youzhou Municipal Bureau was placed in Jixian County. Reverted to Guangyang County in the eighth year of Yongyuan	No  Almost  Together    Top  Describe    Two  Item    construction  成    要  件    之    Sex   Cross    ie    being    see  为    strong  make    sexual  cross    or    and    Not  Full    Combined  French  Sex    Hand in  Year  Age    People  Skills    发    Sheng  Sex     行  为    This    系    为    社  会    法  law    和    道  德    所    No  Rong    许         East    Han  光  武    改  制     Time  Set    Secluded  State    thorn  History    部  于    Thistle  County    永  元    八  Year    Complex  为    广  Yang  Gun    Station    所

鬱	1721		郁	yù	depressed	luxuriant; dense, thick; moody	憂鬱	yōuyù		1583	ㄩ`	ㄧㄡ ㄩ`		The upper element is an obsolete character combining 缶 bulging earthenware jug/vase + an abbreviated form of 棥 (twist vegetation). The lower element is another obsolete character, this one composed of 冖 cover over yet another obsolete character combining 鬯 aromatic herbs and 彡 pattern. Given the meanings conveyed by 鬱 and those of cognate terms, it may be supposed that the original idea was to create a rich brew by grinding aromatic herbs and, after mixing with alcohol, sealing the brew in a container | *dense/luxuriant* growth; *pervasiveness* (← rich brew) | *flourishing*. Also, *mood*, *gloom*, *melancholy* and *depression* (← dense atmosphere ← rich brew). A variant form, 欝, is equally opaque.	images-large/90c1-large.gif	小涼宮 春日 的 憂鬱		MDBG   MDBG   MDBG            MDBG   MDBG            MDBG            MDBG   MDBG	小        xiǎo        ㄒㄧㄠˇ          涼        liáng        ㄌㄧㄤˊ          宮        gōng        ㄍㄨㄥ                                       春        chūn        ㄔㄨㄣ          日        rì        ㄖˋ                                       的        de        ㄉㄜ˙                                       憂        yōu        ㄧㄡ          鬱        yù        ㄩˋ	The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya	Small  Cool  Gong    Chun  Day    的    愛  滿

tāi        ㄊㄞ          數        shù        ㄕㄨˋ	Special family planning policies are implemented in Tibet. Tibetan cadres and urban residents can give birth to one or two births at intervals. There is no restriction on the number of births for Tibetans and other ethnic minorities in the vast agricultural and pastoral areas.    ㄓˊ          委        wěi        ㄨㄟˇ                                       也        yě        ㄧㄝˇ                                       被        bèi        ㄅㄟˋ                                       北        běi        ㄅㄟˇ          京        jīng        ㄐㄧㄥ                                       鐵        tiě        ㄊㄧㄝˇ          路        lù        ㄌㄨˋ                                       公        gōng        ㄍㄨㄥ          安        ān        ㄢ          分        fēn        ㄈㄣ          局        jú        ㄐㄩˊ                                       抓        zhuā        ㄓㄨㄚ          走        zǒu        ㄗㄡˇ                                       瞭        liǎo        ㄌㄧㄠˇ	At midnight on the morning of the month, the martial law troops began to clear the Tiananmen Square. At about the time the students on the left and right squares began to evacuate the martial law troops and stationed in Tiananmen Square at the same time. Executive committee member Shen Yinhan was arrested. Another executive committee member named Bai Zongxiong was also arrested by Beijing Railway Public Security Bureau	Month    Day    Ling  Morning    Hour  Half    Caution  Strict    Department  Team    Open  Begin    Right    Day  Ann  Gate  Guang  Field    Real  OK    Clearing  Field    About    Hour    Left   Right    广  Field    Top    的    Learning  Student    Open  Begin    Withdraw  Leave    Quit   Yan    Department  Team    Same  Time    In  Station    天  安  Gate  广  Field    To  Hours    Half    Full  A    Clearing  Field    Over  Cheng    End  Bundle         Month     Day    Early  Morning    Work  From  Union    的    广  Broadcast    Call    诙  会     Execute  委    Shen    Silver  Han    being  captured    了    another    一    名  call     White  Zong  Male    的    Execute  Committee    Also    Be    North  Beijing    Iron  Road     Public  Ann  Minutes  Bureau    Grab  Go    了

奔	1874		奔	bēn	dash	run fast, flee; rush about; run	奔跑   奔騰	bēnpǎo Bēnténg		1748	ㄅㄣ	ㄅㄣ ㄆㄠˇ  ㄅㄣ ㄊㄥˊ	㇐   ㇓   ㇏   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇓   ㇑	"The present style is based on a bronzeware inscription form combining 夭 (a running figure) + 歮, a variant of 歰 meaning ""be stopped."" However, neither 夭 nor 歮 can be the phonosemantic element in 奔, and the meaning of 奔 (*run*) does not square with the sense ""be stopped."" Other bronzeware forms show 夭 plus an obsolete element of unknown signification. As 奔 conveys the concept ""spread"" in derivative characters such as 賁 and 鼖, the obsolete element may be posited to have been connected with the idea of legs spread in running."	images-large/5954-large.gif		nan				r!

拾	2010		拾	shí	tidy up	pick up, collect, tidy up; accounting form of the numeral ten	收拾	shōushi		1902	ㄕˊ	ㄕㄡ ㄕ˙	㇐   ㇚   ㇀   ㇓   ㇏   ㇐   ㇑   ㇕   ㇐	"As per 合# (press/fit together) + 手 hand/action indicator | *pick up*/*gather* scattered pieces and select that those fit together | *find* | *select*. As with 壱, 弐, and 参/參, this character is used as a substitute for the usual number (in this case, 十) in documents as a  precaution against forgery."	images-large/62fe-large.gif		nan

僕	2464		仆	pú	servant	slave, servant, I	僕			2452	ㄆㄨˊ			"The relevant oracle bone form of 菐# depicts a rough slave/servant spreading his arms in falling prostrate. Distinguish 菐 from 業 (stand with notched wooden supports on both ends) and note that the present-day meaning of 菐 (thicket) is borrowed from the graphically similar 丵. A needle (suggesting the blinding of slaves: compare 艮, 民, and 童) hangs over the slave's head, and a tail is appended to lay unqualified stress on the near-animal nature of a slave's lowly status. adds 人 person for emphasis/clarification | *servant* (person of low birth and rough manners) | humble reference to self | *I* (← casual masculine reference to self)."	images-large/4ec6-large.gif		nan				rͱ

澀	2757		涩	sè	astringent	astringent; harsh; uneven, rough	澀			2839	ㄙㄜ`		㇔   ㇔   ㇀   ㇆   ㇓   ㇔   ㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐   ㇆   ㇓   ㇔   ㇑   ㇐   ㇑   ㇐	The relevant seal inscription form of 歰 shows that the doubled element on top was originally inverted feet, so that the character featured two feet pointing downward + two feet pointing upward | tangling of legs | be stopped. 澀 adds 水 water | liquid that does not flow, but seeps (compare 漸) | *proceed haltingly* | *astringency* (← tongue rendered numb by the deep penetration of astringent juices; compare 浸) | *sober*. Also, *be unwilling/reluctant*, *austere*, *quiet* and *stingy*. 歮 is a variant form of 歰, and 澁 a variant form of 澀. In contemporary Japanese orthography, 澀/澁 is written 渋.	images-large/6da9-large.gif		nan				Á
